name: YLAF New Year Special
description:
This is an add on to the You Live And Fern main game on which information can be found at beetlebethwrites.tumblr.com

I wanted to write snippets about the gang’s perfect New Year’s Eve but I didn’t want to publish them all over separate days.

So... I used the opportunity to use a little bit of twine and make a tiny choose your own NYE with the gang. It’s not a long thing or anything close to being perfect, just with a few options but I hope you all love it!

So much credit to Cer who I used the twine template from.
